SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM COM_BOARD_INFO ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) STR WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 'Q' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND REG_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR REG_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT TBA.* FROM( SELECT TB.* , CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT T.* , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT BOARD_SEQ , NOTI_YN , BOARD_TYPE , TITLE , DEL_YN , SECRET_YN , REP_YN , VIEW_CNT , IP , CASE WHEN SECRET_YN = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(REG_NICK, 1,1), '**') ELSE REG_NICK END AS REG_NICK , REP_SEQ , SORT_NUM , REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE FROM COM_BOARD_INFO ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) STR WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 'Q' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND REG_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR REG_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC
)T,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR )TB )TBA WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.NOTI_YN , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CONTENTS , A.TITLE , A.DEL_YN , A.VIEW_CNT , A.IP , A.REG_NICK , A.SECRET_YN , A.REP_YN , A.REP_SEQ , A.SORT_NUM , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , B.BOARD_SEQ AS ANSWER_BOARD_SEQ , B.CONTENTS AS ANSWER_CONTENTS FROM COM_BOARD_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_BOARD_INFO B ON A.REP_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ}

SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.NOTI_YN , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CONTENTS , A.TITLE , A.DEL_YN , A.VIEW_CNT , A.IP , A.REG_NICK , A.SECRET_YN , A.REP_YN , A.REP_SEQ , A.SORT_NUM , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , B.BOARD_SEQ AS ANSWER_BOARD_SEQ , B.CONTENTS AS ANSWER_CONTENTS FROM COM_BOARD_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_BOARD_INFO B ON A.REP_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = #{ANSWER_BOARD_SEQ}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM COM_BOARD_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.NOTI_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 'N' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT TBA.* FROM( SELECT TB.* , CAST(CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS CHAR) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT T.* , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.NOTI_YN , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CONTENTS , A.TITLE , A.DEL_YN , A.VIEW_CNT , A.IP , A.REG_NICK , A.SECRET_YN , A.REP_YN , A.REP_SEQ , A.SORT_NUM , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE FROM COM_BOARD_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.NOTI_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 'N' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

)T,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR )TB )TBA WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC
SELECT BOARD_SEQ , TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , REG_NICK FROM COM_BOARD_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOTI_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM APT_BOARD_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON A.AREA_SIDO = B.CODE AND B.GRP_CODE = '0001' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON A.AREA_SIGUNGU = C.CODE AND C.GRP_CODE = '0002' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT TBA.* FROM( SELECT TB.* , CAST(CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS CHAR) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT T.* , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT A.MST_BOARD_SEQ , A.APT_NM , A.AREA_SIDO , A.AREA_SIGUNGU , A.ZIP_NO , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.X_LOCATION , A.Y_LOCATION , A.DEL_YN , CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제' ELSE '정상' END AS DEL_YN_NM , A.VIEW_CNT , A.REG_NICK , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , B.CODENM AS SIDO_NM , C.CODENM AS SIGUNGU_NM , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '01' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ01 , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '02' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ02 , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '03' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ03 FROM APT_BOARD_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON A.AREA_SIDO = B.CODE AND B.GRP_CODE = '0001' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON A.AREA_SIGUNGU = C.CODE AND C.GRP_CODE = '0002' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
ORDER BY A.MST_BOARD_SEQ DESC )T,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR )TB )TBA WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE} ORDER BY MST_BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.APT_BOARD_TYPE , CASE WHEN A.APT_BOARD_TYPE = '01' THEN '단지정보' WHEN A.APT_BOARD_TYPE = '02' THEN '세대정보' WHEN A.APT_BOARD_TYPE = '03' THEN '평면도정보' END AS APT_BOARD_TYPE_NM , B.APT_NM , B.AREA_SIDO , B.AREA_SIGUNGU , B.ZIP_NO , B.ADDR1 , B.ADDR2 , A.CONTENTS , B.X_LOCATION , B.Y_LOCATION , A.DEL_YN , CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제' ELSE '정상' END AS DEL_YN_NM , B.VIEW_CNT , B.REG_NICK , B.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE FROM APT_BOARD_INFO A INNER JOIN APT_BOARD_MSTR B ON A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = B.MST_BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ} AND A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = #{MST_BOARD_SEQ}

SELECT A.MST_BOARD_SEQ , A.APT_NM , A.AREA_SIDO , A.AREA_SIGUNGU , A.ZIP_NO , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.X_LOCATION , A.Y_LOCATION , A.DEL_YN , CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제' ELSE '정상' END AS DEL_YN_NM , A.VIEW_CNT , A.REG_NICK , A.REG_ID , A.APT_ERECT_CODE , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE FROM APT_BOARD_MSTR A WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = #{MST_BOARD_SEQ}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM APT_BOARD_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON A.AREA_SIDO = B.CODE AND B.GRP_CODE = '0001' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON A.AREA_SIGUNGU = C.CODE AND C.GRP_CODE = '0002' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT TBA.* FROM( SELECT TB.* , CAST(CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS CHAR) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT T.* , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT A.MST_BOARD_SEQ , A.APT_NM , A.AREA_SIDO , A.AREA_SIGUNGU , A.ZIP_NO , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.X_LOCATION , A.Y_LOCATION , A.DEL_YN , CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제' ELSE '정상' END AS DEL_YN_NM , A.VIEW_CNT , A.REG_NICK , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , B.CODENM AS SIDO_NM , C.CODENM AS SIGUNGU_NM , D.CODENM AS APT_ERECT_NM , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '01' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ01 , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '02' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ02 , (SELECT BOARD_SEQ FROM APT_BOARD_INFO WHERE A.MST_BOARD_SEQ = MST_BOARD_SEQ AND APT_BOARD_TYPE = '03' LIMIT 1) AS BOARD_SEQ03 FROM APT_BOARD_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON A.AREA_SIDO = B.CODE AND B.GRP_CODE = '0001' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON A.AREA_SIGUNGU = C.CODE AND C.GRP_CODE = '0002' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE D ON A.APT_ERECT_CODE = D.CODE AND D.GRP_CODE = '0003' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND D.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND ( B.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR C.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR D.CODENM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )
ORDER BY A.MST_BOARD_SEQ DESC )T,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR )TB )TBA WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE} ORDER BY MST_BOARD_SEQ DESC
